metadata.title: CVE-2025-0518 ffmpeg
metadata.description: Unchecked Return Value, Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability in FFmpeg allows Read Sensitive Constants Within an Executable. This vulnerability is associated with program files  https://github.Com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/blob/master/libavfilter/af_pan.C .  This issue affects FFmpeg: 7.1.  Issue was fixed:Â  https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/b5b6391d64807578ab872dc58fb8aa621dcfc38a   https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/b5b6391d64807578ab872dc58fb8aa621dcfc38a This issue was discovered by: Simcha Kosman
